sentence: Then-gubernatorial candidate Brian Kemp criticized Abrams in 2018 for owing $54,000 to the IRS.

title: Stacey Abrams now a millionaire as she aims to take governor's office

sentence: Former Senator David Perduewho was not only endorsed by former President Donald Trump but encouraged by Trump to make his gubernatorial bidthrew his support behind one of Trump's greatest rivals in Georgia, Governor Brian Kemp, after Perdue suffered a massive loss in Tuesday's primary.

title: David Perdue Throws Support Behind Trump's Rival After Massive Primary Loss
